content_block_programmatic.name: OneSearch iFrame
content_block_programmatic.programmatic_content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<iframe id="onesearch_iframe" src="sn_onesearch_onesearch_page.do" width="100%" onload="resize_iframe()" frameBorder="0"></iframe> 
	
<script>
	//Auto-resize iFrame vertically to (more or less) fit the window frame
	function resize_iframe(){
		var manualOffset = 115;
		var height=window.innerWidth;//Firefox
		if (document.body.clientHeight){
			height=document.body.clientHeight;//IE
		}
	
		document.getElementById("onesearch_iframe").style.height=parseInt(height-
		document.getElementById("onesearch_iframe").offsetTop-manualOffset)+"px";
	}
	//Auto resize frame when window is re-sized
	window.onresize=resize_iframe; 
</script>
</j:jelly>
